###User Defined Function###
_Radian

###Description###
Converts degrees to radians.

###Syntax###
#include <Math.au3>
_Radian ( $nDegrees )


###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$aDegrees
	Degrees to be converted into radians.
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
@@ReturnTable@@
Success:	Radians converted from degrees.
Failure:	Blank string and @error set to 1
@@End@@


###Remarks###
Can be used in conjunction with the Sin(), Cos(), and Tan() functions.


###Related###
_Degree, .Sin, .Cos, .Tan, .ASin, .ACos, .ATan
